alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 2:05PM MST until January 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Bands of moderate to heavy snow are expected to develop this afternoon. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour may occur, with total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver including Interstate 70. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills tonight could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County
